comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Trieste (now in Italy) was an important port for the Austro-Hungarian Empire. See histclo.com/essay/war/ww1/cou/w1c-ita.html for an outline of Italy's participation in WWI The Italians tried repeatedly to reach and capture Trieste over the next two years. Britain and France persuade Italy to join the war in May 1915, with the lure of Austrian territory on the northeast Adriatic, including Trieste.
